OOC: Think what you want KSL, but in my opinion Minime was a great RPer. Im 
not insulting JP here, but i just never found JP's plots as good as Minime's 
were.  You dont feel the same way because 1)Your characters murdered 
Soundwave and 2)All your characters hate organics. Once again im not 
insulting you or JP. You are both good RPers in your own ways, but everything 
Soulstice said is true for me too. JP, remember the group of characters i 
decided to have join your group? They just waited for months outside the 
base, and you never bothered to pay attention, because im not important 
enough, right? Whatever, im not fighting anymore. I end this post with an 
excerpt from a good song:

Out here in the fields
I fight for my meals
I get my back into my living
I dont need to fight
To prove im right
I dont need to be forgiven
Come and take my hand
and we'll ride cross the land
Lets get together before we get much older- The Who

--part1_53.1d736fd.27acde89_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
